posts.content:
hey all after a 600 mile round trip to look at a bus on my b-day i was dissapointed to say the least!
the following bus is pretty solid underneath except for a small area 2inch sq. full of bathroom sealant near the rear jacking point.
1 sill has been replaced inner and utter but the other has just had a thick layer of filler skimmed over rust
both rear corners have rust and holes visible from the inside but again has just been covered with thick filler
engine will need rebuild very soon and gearbox is buggered, both of which have a 10mm layer or oil sludge covering the entire underneath
cargo doors have had windows at some point that have now been blessed with a good inch of filler
front cab floor has 2 large OG metal plates tacked on which water traps galore!
the rest of the body of the bus has signs of heavy filler use under the rollered paint aswell.

at this point i gave up looking and drove home

hopefully this post will stop someone else wasting time and money eh!

http://cgi.ebay.co.uk/1966-VW-Splitscre ... 1c1490a860
sounds like a good un after some of the vans I looked at ,but hey well done for posting it ,as some poor bugger would have made the same trip!!good luck in your search .

Sorry to hear dude, should never have got rid of your last one...... good luck in your continued search, one will turn up i'm sure

Tom

cheers
Hmmmmm look on the bright side you didn't buy the thing
